SUBTITLE: Your Game Scripting Engine

KEYWORDS.TITLE: Keywords
KEYWORDS.HEADLINE: Schlüsselwörter dienen dazu, den Programmfluss zu kontrollieren sowie Variablen, Arrays, Funktionen und Typen zu deklarieren.

DEPRECATED_KEYWORDS.TITLE: Deprecated Keywords
DEPRECATED_KEYWORDS.HEADLINE: Einige veraltete Schlüsselwörter aus BlitzBasic werden in BBScript nicht unterstützt.

VARIABLES.TITLE: Variables
VARIABLES.HEADLINE: Lerne die verschiedenen Arten von Variablen in BBScript kennen und erfahre, wie sie funktionieren.

SELECTIONS.TITLE: Bedingungen und Auswahl
SELECTIONS.HEADLINE: Mithilfe von Bedingungen und Auswahl-Blöcken steuerst du den Programmablauf je nach aktuellem Zustand.

DATA_BLOCKS.TITLE: Arrays und Datenblöcke
DATA_BLOCKS.HEADLINE: Arrays sind Speicherfelder, in denen eine große Anzahl von Daten einfach verwaltet werden kann. Datenblöcke können genutzt werden, um komplexe Informationen wie Levelinhalte schnell verfügbar zu machen.

LOOPS.TITLE: Schleifen
LOOPS.HEADLINE: Schleifen sind dafür gedacht, bestimmte Code-Abschnitte mehrmals hintereinander auszuführen.
LOOPS.SUBTITLE: Um Befehle mehrmals hintereinander auszuführen, kannst du dich zwischen drei verschiedenen Schleifentypen in BBScript entscheiden.

FUNCTIONS.TITLE: Funktionen
FUNCTIONS.HEADLINE: Funktionen helfen dir, deinen Code in logische Abschnitte zu unterteilen.

TYPES.TITLE: Typen
TYPES.HEADLINE: Benutze Typen, um beliebig viele Spielobjekte während der Laufzeit zu erzeugen.

MATHS.TITLE: Logik und Mathematik
MATHS.HEADLINE: Logische Operatoren werden eingesetzt, um mehrere Bedingungen miteinander zu verknüpfen.

DIVERSE.TITLE: Diverses
DIVERSE.HEADLINE: Hier findest du spezielle Schlüsselwörter, die in keine andere Kategorie passen.

COMMANDS.TITLE: Commands
COMMANDS.HEADLINE: Commands are predefined templates that breathe life into your games.
COMMANDS.SUBTITLE: BlitzBasicScript consists of more than 700 commands for game controls. They are sorted by category and subdivided into several scopes.

DEPRECATED_COMMANDS.TITLE: Obsolete Befehle
DEPRECATED_COMMANDS.HEADLINE: Hier findest du alle Befehle, welche zwar in BlitzBasic existieren, aber nicht in BBScript.

WORK_IN_PROGRESS.TITLE: Projekt State: Alpha 0.0.1
WORK_IN_PROGRESS.TEXT: Currently, the BlitzBasicScript implementation is still in alpha state. For that reason this website only provides few information and features at the moment but will be extended and improved continuously.

FORGOT_PW_SUBTITLE: Please enter your username or email address in the text field below. We will send you an email with instructions how you can reset your password.
REGISTER_FOR_FREE: If you have no account yet, you can register for free.
JETZT_LERNE_ICH: Jetzt lerne ich Spiele programmieren mit BlitzBasic (German)
MISSION_SUBTITLE: BlitzBasicScript is a simple yet powerful scripting language based on the BlitzBasic syntax. The primary intention of BBScript is to create games which can be played in any modern web browser – from unspectacular skill games to advanced 3D shooters.

1.TITLE: More than 700 powerful commands
1.MESSAGE: Create vivid 3D worlds, donate your virtual environment a suitable sound and build an intuitive <abbr title="Graphical User Interface">GUI</abbr> with only few instructions. More than 700 commands - concerning 2D and 3D graphics, data processing, controls and many more - offer a comfortable programming experience to you.

2.TITLE: Modern graphics engine
2.MESSAGE: Thanks to the newest version of von BabylonJS you will discover unprecedented graphic power in your browser, even on mobile devices.

3.TITLE: Platform independence
3.MESSAGE: Code once, gamble everywhere: Your games can be executed in any modern web browser. No more old-fashioned OS limitations - just start a web browser on your device and visit blitzbasicscript.com. That's all.

4.TITLE: Online-<abbr title="Integrated Development Environment">IDE</abbr>
4.MESSAGE: Develop your games quickly and easily wherever you are. You simply need an account at blitzbasicscript.com as well as an internet connection and away you go!

5.TITLE: Numerous assets completely free
5.MESSAGE: Times are over when you painted all images and recorded sounds yourself: The BlitzBasicScript Cloud provides hundreds of tile sets, 3D models, sounds and background musics as well as fonts and much more. Of course you can still add unlimited private assets to your own projects.

6.TITLE: Recast of the legendary BlitzBasic
6.MESSAGE: A few years ago BlitzBasic was an insider tip among indie game developers. With BlitzBasicScript you can resuscitate countless former BB games in a browser: The syntax is almost identical so you just need to copy a BlitzBasic source code into the online IDE and hit 'Play'!

7.TITLE: Realistic shadow rendering and physic effects
7.MESSAGE: Several brand new commands extend the classical BlitzBasic language, allowing for 3D objects to get illuminated physically correct and to cast shadows at each other as well as on the ground. Moreover, you can apply physics to every 3D object to make your gaming experience as realistic as possible.

8.TITLE: Open source project
8.MESSAGE: The whole project BlitzBasicScript (including lexer, parser, renderer and all in-game services) has been published under MIT license and can be downloaded from GitHub.

9.TITLE: Long-term support
9.MESSAGE: 2020 is just the beginning: Never before it was possible to run high quality games smoothly in a web browser. BlitzBasicScript offers modern, future-oriented indie game developers a perfect alternative compared to Unity or C++. This project will be continuously developed in the next years. Thanks to progressive web standards and hardware improvements, browser-based game development will become a new state of the art.

LEXER.TITLE: Lexer
LEXER.SUBTITLE:
The Lexer analyses your BBScript code and generates so called tokens which are used for further processing and subsequent program execution.

Click on the tab Editor and type or paste your code. Then switch to Tokens and inspect the components of your code. Move the mouse over a token to show its purpose. In the Table tab you find all tokens listed below each other.

REGISTER_SUBTITLE:
Create an account for BlitzBasicScript to achieve premium features:

  • Save your projects online in the BBScript Cloud
  • Get 100 MB webspace to upload resources
  • Access more than 100 additional assets (graphics, models, sounds)
USER_NAME: User Name (alphanumeric; must have at least 2 and at most 32 characters)
I_READ_TERMS: I have read the terms and conditions and accept them entirely.
NAME: Name
USERNAME_EMPTY: The user name must not be empty
USERNAME_TOO_SHORT: The username is too short, please type at least two characters
USERNAME_TOO_LONG: The username is too long, please use at most 32 characters
USERNAME_MUST_BE_ALPHANUMERIC: The username must be alphanumeric (allowed characters are numbers, letters and space characters)
EMAIL_EXISTS: This email address has already been used for a registration
EMAIL_EMPTY: The email address must not be empty
EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: The password must consist of at least 8 characters
PASSWORDS_DO_NOT_MATCH: The password inputs do not match
AGB_MUST_BE_ACCEPTED: You must accept the terms for registration to continue.
WAIT_FOR_EMAIL_TOKEN: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address. There your will find a token link which you have to click to complete your registration.
USERNAME_PASSWORD_COMBINATION_INVALID: The combination of username and password is invalid.
